Unexpected any. Specify a different type.
'numericId' is assigned a value but never used.
'paper_total' is assigned a value but never used.
'author_total' is assigned a value but never used.
'org_total' is assigned a value but never used.
'venue_total' is assigned a value but never used.
Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.
Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.
